title: Statistical Literacy Microlearning for Social Workers: Motivation Design Based on the ARCS Model

context.prior_knowledge: Social Welfare Practice Experience and Understanding of Basic Statistical Concepts
context.additional_context: Mobile environment utilizing digital devices, requiring case-based education immediately applicable in social welfare settings.

learning_goals: Learners can explain statistical concepts based on the ARCS model with over 80% accuracy.
Learners conduct hypothesis testing using real-world data from social welfare settings at least three times.
Learners achieve 90% proficiency in applying statistical terminology through interactive quizzes provided in a mobile environment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
